name: Lost Wishes - GameJam
description:
After being pulled from your world into this one, you're tasked with helping out a forest full of critters. All of them needing a wish. Use [W][A][S][D] to move around the map, talking with critters and finding their lost wishes. Use [Spacebar] to grant each characters wish, but only after you've found it. 

This game was made for the 2022 CozyJam. I inteded this to be less of a game and more of an art showcase. I plan to continue work on this game and release a more finished version on a different itch.io page.
